title: How color-changing, bacteria-infused spacesuits could help keep future astronauts safe from space radiation
description: Like a mood ring, clothing could let future space travelers know when they've been exposed to unsafe levels of radiation.
content: Like a mood ring, clothing could let future space travelers know when they've been exposed to unsafe levels of radiation.
